author: Josh Gerstein
title: State Department FOIA work crippled by virus precautions
description: The department's capacity to process records has dropped by 96 percent, an official said.
content:
We currently estimate that there is a 96% reduction in ability to process FOIA requests as a result of the unavailability of REAs, wrote Stein, using States shorthand for retired annuitants.
Stein said he ordered the retired employees to stay out of the offi… [+2929 chars]
